name: Shrub
description: Shrub is a memecoin on the Solana blockchain, inspired by Elon Musk's pet hedgehog, named Shrub. The project aims to create a community-driven cryptocurrency with a unique hedgehog-themed mascot. The project aims to create a community-driven cryptocurrency with a hedgehog-themed mascot, which sets it apart from other cryptocurrencies and memecoins. Shrub's mascot has become a symbol of the project's identity, embodying the playful and unconventional nature of the Solana blockchain and the cryptocurrency world as a whole.
